src:
Lara Jankovič kot prostitutka
Gledalcem bo razgrnila dušo prodajalke ljubezni Vivian.
01 Nov 2019, 12:22 by A. K.
Igralka ​Lara Jankovič se je v bogati in dolgoletni karieri znašla v številnih vlogah, a ta, ki jo bo oboževalcem premierno predstavila ta četrtek, je zagotovo nekaj posebnega. Jankovičeva se bo namreč znašla v vlogi prostitutke Vivian, ki se je za poklic odločila iz praktičnih razlogov. Lahko bi postala kar koli drugega, vendar delo najrajši opravlja leže in doma. Za dobro plačilo je vedno pripravljena sodelovati, ima pa svoja načela, od katerih ne odstopa, tudi če se svet podre.
Telesnost je le pika na i dobremu partnerstvu.
Komedija Poredna Vivi je odlično sredstvo, da množici približamo tabuje, poleg tega igralka precej hudomušno in iskreno razgrne dušo prostitutke. »Prostitucija je bila, je in vedno bo, zato Vivi prikupno pove, da se ne razlikujemo toliko med sabo, kot si mislimo. Ob svoji dejavnosti se dotakne številnih življenjskih resnic, našteva, kaj vse bi lahko postala, a kakor koli obrne, je najbolje, da je to, kar je: sama svoj šef. Ne posvečamo se samo mesenosti, tudi malce globlje gremo, v moško-ženske odnose. Telesnost je le pika na i dobremu partnerstvu, saj če ni pravega zaupanja, odprtosti, iskrenosti, sprejemanja sebe in partnerja v najbolj intimnem pomenu, potem, oprostite, tudi orgazma ne bo,« brez dlake na jeziku pove Jankovičeva, ki je že večkrat iskreno spregovorila o odnosih, tudi o svojih, zaradi česar jo je mati menda večkrat kritizirala.
text:
Lara Jankovic as a prostitute
It will unveil the soul of the Vivian love saleswoman to viewers.
01 Nov 2019, 12:22 by A.K.
Actress Lara Jankovic has found herself in many roles in her rich and long career, but this one, which will premiere to fans this Thursday, is definitely something special. Namely, Jankovic will find herself in the role of a prostitute, Vivian, who chose to pursue the profession for practical reasons. She could become anything else, but she prefers to work at home and at home. She is always willing to cooperate for good pay, but she has her own principles that she does not deviate from, even if the world breaks down.
Physicality is just the highlight of a good partnership.
The Naughty Vivi comedy is a great way to bring taboos closer to the crowd, and the actress is quite hilarious and sincere in exposing the prostitute's soul. "Prostitution has been, is, and always will be, so Vivi tells us neatly that we are not as different from one another as we think. He touches upon many realities of life in his activity, enumerates what she could become, but whatever she turns to, it is best to be what she is: her own boss. We are not only focusing on meatiness, we are also going a little deeper into male-female relationships. Physicality is just the point of a good partnership, because if there is no real trust, openness, honesty, acceptance of oneself and partner in the most intimate sense, then, sorry, there will be no orgasm, "says Jankovic, hairless in his language, which is sincerely sincere talked about relationships, including her own, which made her mother repeatedly criticized.
